short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Complete and assign 3rd party memo reviews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brightidea Memo Extension makes it easy to view, assign, or complete a review of your Memos when working with a Microsoft OneDrive document. Some great features about this extension is that you can:

Quickly access your memos from anywhere.
Get subject matter experts to see and complete their memo review action items.
Memo authors or admins can assign reviews and access the review history.

Find your company’s equivalent to Amazon Prime with Brightidea Memo! Brightidea Memo allows you to wield the same powerful techniques that transformed Amazon from an online bookstore into one of the most dominant tech companies in the world. Big ideas can be difficult to manage because they defy BAU processes and deserve well thought out proposals in order to truly consider the needs of the customer and necessary investments to bring these ideas to market.

Amazon and a few others companies have captured this lightning in a bottle through writing well thought out memos that turn into their next billion dollar innovations. Brightidea Memo captures the same lightning in a bottle for your team to discover, develop, review, prioritize and approve your next game changing innovations. The Memo browser extension enables users to write and review memos in your favorite writing tools like Microsoft Word and Google Docs.

Don’t have Memo? Sign up for a free trial today to start using the memo browser extension: https://www.brightidea.com/memo/start-memo-trial/ 

Already a Memo user? Just download the browser extension and follow the login instructions to use the writing tools you love seamlessly with Brightidea Memo.



ABOUT BRIGHTIDEA

At Brightidea, we’re passionate about innovation. We believe it’s the lifeblood of progress, advancing the human condition and improving the world around us. To that end, we’ve set out to accelerate the success of innovation by empowering those behind it with advanced software to facilitate and streamline the ideation process—and the collaboration it thrives on.
					
With offices in San Francisco and New York City, we’ve worked with over 300 leading global brands, including Accenture, Bayer, Cisco, GE, and MasterCard to achieve hundreds of millions of dollars of financial innovation impact.
